articles.author: Yuliya Talmazan, Ostap Hunkevych
articles.title: Ukraine and the U.S. appear at odds over Russia offensive - NBC News
articles.description: America’s top military commander is warning that Kyiv has limited time to pursue a stagnating military offensive as senior Ukrainian officials vow to push on, possibly putting Ukraine and its top backer, the U.S., at odds.
articles.content: Americas top military commander is warning that Kyiv has limited time to pursue a stagnating military offensive as senior Ukrainian officials vow to push on, possibly putting Ukraine and its top back… [+4224 chars]
